title: Although CONF.fatal_deprecations=True raises DeprecatedConfig it is not fatal

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content: This appears to be working as expected.  It's raising an exception on use of a deprecated option.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb

comments.content:
This code comes from oslo, so marked as invalid in nova until its resolved there.

the config option fatal_deprecations help message says 'Make deprecations fatal' meaning it should case the program to die.


But the code just logs a critical log and raises an DeprecatedConfig(Exception) which won't force a program to die. So either the config name misnamed or the code is wrong.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content: We should make sure that oslo.config is correctly throwing the exception. Treating that exception as an exit condition will be up to the author of the application main loop.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~doug-hellmann

comments.content: Looks like it is working: https://review.openstack.org/#/c/130041/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo
